room_title: Escape room "Meltdown" by The Enigma Project in Pittsburgh
room_address: 1 Hundred Acres Drive Bethel Park, PA 15102
room_description: Become an assigned NRC Investigator to investigate the cause of the high radiation levels leaking from the reactor cores at the headquarters of FLUX Atomic Furnace, Inc. Enter through a decontamination chamber before proceeding into the treatment center that FLUX has prepared for experimental research. In the center, you will find the sole employee left behind after the events began occurring. Save the employee to obtain a passcode that will unlock the Nuclear Fission Center epicenter and shut down the core reactor before catastrophic levels leak into Pittsburgh.
